DOC.brief_summary: The purpose registry evaluate safety efficacy Intramesh T1 . This registry collect data 100 patient treated ventral hernia repair .
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Open Ventral Hernia Repair Using Intramesh T1
DOC.criteria: Patient old 18 year Written inform consent obtain patient Patient primary incisional ventral hernia Patient recurrent ventral hernia Patient ASA class 5 6 Patient underwent emergency surgery Patient pregnant Patient know allergy component ePTFE prosthesis Patient life expectancy le 1 year Patient unable compliant followup visit due geographical , social psychological factor
